description: Through a sequence of projects, architectural design students learn about drawing (hand drafting and computer-aided drawing and design) and architectural design processes that require the integration of social, artistic, technical, and environmental issues. Prerequisite: Art 102. Materials fee. Offered alternate years.
name: Arch Drawing/Design I
prerequisites: Art 102. Materials fee. Offered alternate years.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Art 102. Materials fee. Offered alternate years.

title: Architectural Drawing and Design I
